ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
//处理数据
var riqi=(new Date()).toISOString();
var riqiformat=riqi.match(/(\d\d\d\d)/)[1]+riqi.match(/\d\d\d\d-(\d\d)-\d\d/)[1];
var headers = {"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36"};
//获取上一级数据
var listurl = java.get("listurl");
var page = java.get("page");
var classify = java.get("classify");
var classifys = java.get("classifys");
var all = java.get("all");
java.log(classify);
//发送请求获取_csrfToken
var url_rank = "https://m.qidian.com/rank/";
var res = java.get(url_rank,headers);
var res_headers = String(res.headers());
var token = res_headers.match(/(_csrfToken.*?)\;/)[1];
//分类区
if(listurl==""){
	if(classify==""){
		if(all !=""){
			classify_url ="https://m.qidian.com/majax/recommend/classiclist?_csrfToken"+token+"&gender=male&pageNum="+page;
			}else{
	classify_url ="https://m.qidian.com/majax/category/list?_csrfToken="+token+"&gender=male&pageNum="+page+"&orderBy=&"+classifys+"&subCatId=";
	}
	}else{
	classify_url ="https://m.qidian.com/majax/category/list?_csrfToken="+token+"&gender=male&pageNum="+page+"&orderBy=&"+classify+"&subCatId=&isfinish=1";
	}
	
	var res_list=String(java.get(classify_url,headers).body());
jsonList =JSON.parse(res_list);
var blist = [];
for(var i=0;i<jsonList.data.records.length;i++){
var alist =[];
var llist =[];
num=(Number(page)-1)*20+i+1;
llist.push("第"+num+"名");
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].cat);
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].state);
 if(jsonList.data.records[i].rankCnt!=null){
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].rankCnt);
 }
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].cnt);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bid);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bName);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bAuth);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].desc);
alist.push(llist);	alist.push("https://bookcover.yuewen.com/qdbimg/349573/"+jsonList.data.records[i].bid+"/150");
alist.push("https://book.qidian.com/info/"+jsonList.data.records[i].bid);
	blist.push(alist);
	}
	blist
	//排行榜区
	}else{
list_url ="https://m.qidian.com/majax/rank/"+listurl+"?"+token+"&gender=male&pageNum="+page+"&catId=-1&yearmonth="+riqiformat;

var res_list=String(java.get(list_url,headers).body());
jsonList =JSON.parse(res_list);

var blist = [];

for(var i=0;i<jsonList.data.records.length;i++){
var alist =[];
var llist =[];
llist.push("第"+jsonList.data.records[i].rankNum+"名");
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].cat);
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].subCat);
 if(jsonList.data.records[i].rankCnt!=null){
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].rankCnt);
 }
 llist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].cnt);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bid);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bName);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].bAuth);
	alist.push(jsonList.data.records[i].desc);
alist.push(llist);	alist.push("https://bookcover.yuewen.com/qdbimg/349573/"+jsonList.data.records[i].bid+"/150");
alist.push("https://book.qidian.com/info/"+jsonList.data.records[i].bid);
	blist.push(alist);
	}
	blist
	}
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("EP99Mjk5Bc5jInLnKfUgRaOo0oZmUANFRDmyf05uTx8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
 Packages.java.lang,
 Packages.javax.crypto,
 Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
 Packages.java.io,
 Packages.java.util,
 Packages.java.util.zip,
);

with(javaImport){
 function decrypt(str){
 	var h=result.substring(16);
 	var u=result.substring(0,16);
 	var p=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(String(h));
 	var t=String("Shuew237HSFH242s").getBytes("UTF-8");
 var key=SecretKeySpec(t,"AES");
 var iv=IvParameterSpec(String(u).getBytes("UTF-8")); 
 var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
 chipher.init(2,key,iv);
 var m=chipher.doFinal(p);
 var arr1 = new Array(m.length+1);
 arr1.push(m);
 arr1[m.length]=0;
 var inflaterInputStream = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(m));
 var byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(512);
 while (true) {
 var read = inflaterInputStream.read();
 if (read != -1) {
 byteArrayOutputStream.write(read);
 } else {
 	byteArrayOutputStream.close();
 return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
 }
 }
 }
}
decrypt(result)
</js>$.data

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

d:bk.wordNum,
e:bk.chapterName,
f:bk.intro,
g:bk.picture
};
})()

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-asmh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

<js>
result=result.replace(/onclick="payChapter\('(.*?)','.*?',.*?\);"/g,'href="$1"');
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#episodes a,#extra_episodes a");
if(String(list).match(/class="price_tag_icon">￥/)){
result=list
}else{
list=doc.select("#episodes a");
list2=doc.select("#extra_episodes a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
b=list2.toArray().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
result=a.concat(b)
}</js>

bookSourceComment:
密钥手动复制到coco漫画书源的源变量

发现-coco漫画-任意发现-打开任意漫画-右上角-设置源变量-删除-粘贴-确认

不会的可以等远程自动更新，密钥会自动更新


常见问题：
1.ip被禁止 如何处理
更换网络或者使用代理，增大并发率 默认10次/20秒
2.经常验证cloudflare
设置正常ua，增大并发，调小线程和预加载，使用ip固定的网络
3.密钥错误
等待密钥自动更新，每天会自动更新
https://github.com/Xwite/autoCI

id=baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]
url="http://qiman56.com/bookchapter/"
body="id="+id+"&id2=1"
option={"method":"POST","body":String(body)}
data=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))
for(i in data){list.push({"title":data[i].name,"curl":"/"+String(id)+"/"+data[i].id+".html"})}
